Key information

  • The postcode is OX2 6JG.

  • You will need to register for council tax with the city council at www.oxford.gov.uk/council-tax.

  • The hot water control panel is on the wall to the right of the refrigerator.

  • The electricity meter is in the cupboard in the hall.

  • The water mains stop cock is in the cupboard in the wall at the far end of the kitchen.

  • There are manuals for appliances on under the 'User Manuals' tab on this site.

  • You may wish to arrange insurance for your property as it will not be not covered by the buildings insurance.
